trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Using BizTalk Bridges to Insert Flat File Messages into an On-premises SQL Server
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Using BizTalk Bridges to Insert Flat File Messages into an On-premises SQL Server

trans-unit.source: This tutorial provides instructions on how to configure a <token>af_integration</token> solution that receives a flat-file message from an FTP server, processes it through a <token>bridge</token> deployed under the <token>af_integration</token> subscription on <token>azure_1</token>, and then inserts the message into an on-premises <token>ssNoVersion</token> database.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial provides instructions on how to configure a <token>af_integration</token> solution that receives a flat-file message from an FTP server, processes it through a <token>bridge</token> deployed under the <token>af_integration</token> subscription on <token>azure_1</token>, and then inserts the message into an on-premises <token>ssNoVersion</token> database.

trans-unit.source: Business Scenario
trans-unit.target: Business Scenario

trans-unit.source: Fabrikam and Contoso are two business partners.
trans-unit.target: Fabrikam and Contoso are two business partners.

trans-unit.source: Fabrikam (the retailer) sends sales order messages to Contoso (the supplier).
trans-unit.target: Fabrikam (the retailer) sends sales order messages to Contoso (the supplier).

trans-unit.source: Contoso maintains all the sales order data in table called Orders, which is housed in a <token>ssNoVersion</token> database within Contoso’s premises.
trans-unit.target: Contoso maintains all the sales order data in table called Orders, which is housed in a <token>ssNoVersion</token> database within Contoso’s premises.

trans-unit.source: Fabrikam sends flat-file messages to Contoso using an FTP server.
trans-unit.target: Fabrikam sends flat-file messages to Contoso using an FTP server.

trans-unit.source: Hence, Contoso has to implement a solution that enables the following:
trans-unit.target: Hence, Contoso has to implement a solution that enables the following:

trans-unit.source: Contoso must pull the flat file messages from the FTP server at which Fabrikam drops the sales order messages.
trans-unit.target: Contoso must pull the flat file messages from the FTP server at which Fabrikam drops the sales order messages.

trans-unit.source: Contoso must process the message received from Fabrikam and map it to the message for inserting the sales order in its <token>ssNoVersion</token> database.
trans-unit.target: Contoso must process the message received from Fabrikam and map it to the message for inserting the sales order in its <token>ssNoVersion</token> database.

trans-unit.source: To enable this scenario, Contoso does the following:
trans-unit.target: To enable this scenario, Contoso does the following:

trans-unit.source: Generates the schema of the flat-file message that it will receive from Fabrikam.
trans-unit.target: Generates the schema of the flat-file message that it will receive from Fabrikam.

trans-unit.source: Configures an <token>one-way</token> as part of the <token>msgflow_proj</token> to enable message validation and transformation.
trans-unit.target: Configures an <token>one-way</token> as part of the <token>msgflow_proj</token> to enable message validation and transformation.

trans-unit.source: This <token>bridge</token> takes a flat-file message, validates it against the schema generated earlier, and then transforms it to the schema required to enter a message into the <token>ssNoVersion</token> database.
trans-unit.target: This <token>bridge</token> takes a flat-file message, validates it against the schema generated earlier, and then transforms it to the schema required to enter a message into the <token>ssNoVersion</token> database.

trans-unit.source: Uses <token>lobconnect</token> to connect to the on-premise <token>ssNoVersion</token> database from the <token>one-way</token> deployed under the <token>af_integration</token> subscription.
trans-unit.target: Uses <token>lobconnect</token> to connect to the on-premise <token>ssNoVersion</token> database from the <token>one-way</token> deployed under the <token>af_integration</token> subscription.

trans-unit.source: Before You Begin this Tutorial
trans-unit.target: Before You Begin this Tutorial

trans-unit.source: For instructions on how to prepare for the <token>af_integration</token> scenario, see <link xlink:href="57f25980-f745-4e8e-8a7e-4e0e87877dd5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How do I Start Configuring Service Bus EAI and EDI Solutions</link>.
trans-unit.target: For instructions on how to prepare for the <token>af_integration</token> scenario, see <link xlink:href="57f25980-f745-4e8e-8a7e-4e0e87877dd5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How do I Start Configuring Service Bus EAI and EDI Solutions</link>.

trans-unit.target: Sample Based on this Tutorial

trans-unit.source: You can also look at the sample that is based on this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: You can also look at the sample that is based on this tutorial.
